Package org.jacorb.util

Class Summary
Diagnostic JacORB Diagnostic class.
ObjectUtil  
SelectorManager Defines the entity which waits for I/O and time events to occur and dispatches notifications to the interested request callbacks.
SelectorRequest defines a single request to be registered with the selector.
SelectorRequestCallback Base class for the callback handlers to be suppied to the SelectorRequest object.
Time Contains static methods to handle CORBA time values.
TimerQueue Defines a single thread with a queue enabling notification of timer expiration.
TimerQueueAction Defines a single thread with a queue enabling notification of timer expiration.
ValueHandler A static wrapper around classes in javax.rmi.
Version Version identification file.
 

Enum Summary
SelectorRequest.Status the current status of the request.
SelectorRequest.Type the types of events to be waited for.
